Core Packages

@snps/core

The heart of the Synapse framework with HTTP server, middleware, caching, performance monitoring, WebSocket support, logging, configuration management, error handling, and monitoring dashboard.

v1.0.0 100% coverage
HTTP ServerMiddlewareCachingWebSocketLoggingPerformance MonitoringError Handling
View Docs

@snps/routing

Advanced routing system with path matching, parameters, middleware support, and route grouping.

v1.0.0 100% coverage
Path MatchingParametersMiddlewareRoute Grouping
View Docs

@snps/database

In-memory database with ORM capabilities, QueryBuilder, Model class, relationships, and validation.

v1.0.0 100% coverage
In-Memory StorageORMQueryBuilderRelationshipsValidation
View Docs

@snps/auth

Comprehensive authentication and authorization system with OAuth2, JWT, and security features

v1.0.0 100% coverage
OAuth2JWTPassword HashingSession ManagementCSRF Protection
View Docs

@snps/templating

Advanced templating engine with .webml support, variables, conditionals, and loops

v1.0.0 100% coverage
.webml SupportVariablesConditionalsLoopsHTML Escaping
View Docs

@snps/testing

Comprehensive testing framework with mocks, spies, stubs, and 100% coverage tools

v1.0.0 100% coverage

🎨 Beautiful UI Components

Create stunning user interfaces with our comprehensive UI component library featuring 600+ bulletproof components.

🚀 Zero Dependencies

Pure TypeScript/HTML/CSS implementation with no external dependencies

♿ Fully Accessible

WCAG 2.1 AA compliant components with full keyboard navigation

📱 Responsive Design

Mobile-first approach with comprehensive breakpoint system

🎨 Theme Support

Built-in theming with CSS custom properties and dark mode

Explore UI Components View on GitHub

Why Choose Synapse?

🎯 Zero Dependencies

Built with pure TypeScript and Node.js APIs for maximum reliability and performance

🔒 100% Type Safe

Complete TypeScript support throughout the entire framework with full type inference

🧩 Modular Architecture

22 independent packages for different capabilities, use only what you need

🚀 Cutting-Edge Features

AI/ML, blockchain, PWA, voice interfaces, WebAssembly, WebRTC, and more

🏢 Enterprise Ready

Production-grade security, monitoring, scalability, and microservices support

🧪 Test-Driven Development

Built-in testing framework with 100% coverage goal and TDD best practices

© 2024 Synapse Framework. Built with Synapse itself to showcase its power.
